names.pinyin: qing gu zi shen tang jia wei
names.english: modified cool the bones and nourish the kidneys decoction
names.commonEnglish: Modified Cool the Bones and Nourish the Kidneys Decoction

actions: Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin and benefits Jing.
Clears Heat, cools, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Deficiency Fire and clears Liver Fire.
Wit6h Sheng Di Huang, for Kidney Yin Deficiency with steaming bones.
With Zhi Mu and Sheng Di Huang, for menopause with Yin Deficiency and Heat.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
With Xuan Shen, for Kidney Yin Deficiency with Fire Blazing with soreness and swelling in the throat, dry mouth and a parched tongue.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood and nourishes Yin.
Tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin.
Tonifies the Kidneys and astringes Jing.
With Mu Li and Xuan Shen, for night sweats due to Yin Deficiency.
Clears Heat, drains Fire, nourishes Yin, moistens Dryness and clears Deficiency Fire.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao and drains Deficiency Heat.
With Zhi Mu, for Yin Deficiency fever with steaming bones and night sweats.
Invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, regulates Qi and alleviates pain.
Spreads and regulates Liver Qi, regulates menstruation and alleviates pain.
Calms the Liver, benefits Yin and anchors Floating Yang.
Promotes the movement of Qi, dissipates clumps and stops pain for swelling and pain of the breasts and acute mastitis.
Nourishes Kidney Yin
Clears Blood Heat
Regulates the Liver
syndromes: Kidney Yin Deficiency with Blood Heat and Liver Qi Stagnation

symptoms: Possibly a history of late menarche
Decreased menses with light colored Blood and no blood clots
Aches and weakness in the waist and legs
Distention and pain in the sides or flanks
Breast distention and pain before and during menses
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin and white or Little or None
manifestations.pulse: Thready and rapid or Floating and Empty or Wiry

notes: Take this formula premenstrually and take Modified Liang Di Tang after menstruation.
